live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37103.summary: Some customers in the Waverley Park area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37103.title: May 4 – Thunder Bay (Waverley Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
